endpoints.description: Upload data related to renewable energy sources, such as solar and wind, for analytics.
Retrieve results of the system simulation performed on the uploaded data.
Fetch the current integration status of renewable energy sources into the grid.
Update the parameters for simulations to better align results with specific scenarios.
Access detailed reports on energy generation statistics by renewable sources.
Set up custom alerts for unusual grid status or systemic failures.
Obtain optimization suggestions for integrating renewable energy efficiently.
Remove outdated system data to maintain storage efficiency.
View the predicted energy output for upcoming periods based on current data.
Submit user feedback for the analysis functionality for further improvements.
